## zelos.RightConnectionShape class

An object containing information about the space a right connection shape takes up during rendering.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class RightConnectionShape extends Measurable 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Measurable

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `RightConnectionShape` class.
